recipes.mnt_utils::set_hostname: Sets the system's hostname to match the nickname in the RightScale dashboard
recipes.mnt_utils::install_windowsupdates: Downloads and installs all pending windows updates for the server
recipes.mnt_utils::helloworld: A recipe which should always work, used as a control test
recipes.mnt_utils::set_dns: Sets the DNS search list ot the provided CSV list
recipes.mnt_utils::install_bginfo: Installs the BGInfo tool and sets it to run on each user login
recipes.mnt_utils::install_scom_agent: Installs the Microsoft System Center Operations Manager (SCOM) agent using settings from active directory
recipes.mnt_utils::install_roles_and_features: Installs one or many Windows 2008 roles and features using the mnt_utils::features_and_roles_list as input.

mnt_utils/scom_share_subdir.description: The subdirectory of the share (if any) which contains the SCOM agent install files.  If your SCOM Share UNC Path is \fileserverSCOMShare, and this is InstallationFilesAgent the full UNC path will be \fileserverSCOMShareInstallationFilesAgent

mnt_utils/scom_share_pass.description: The password of a user who has permissions to access the share which contains the SCOM agent.

mnt_utils/features_and_roles_list.description: A CSV list of features and roles to install.  To view the list of available roles and features run 'servermanagercmd -query' on a Windows 2008 server instance

mnt_utils/scom_share_unc.description: The UNC path of the share containing the SCOM agent installers.  Example: \fileserverSCOMShare

mnt_utils/scom_share_user.description: The username of a user who has permissions to access the share which contains the SCOM agent.

mnt_utils/rs_uuid.description: Just set this to the RS_INSTANCE_UUID ENV value

mnt_utils/rs_server_name.description: The RightScale dashboard nickname, this should be set to ENV:RS_SERVER_NAME

mnt_utils/dns_list.display_name: A comma separated list of IPV4 addresses of DNS servers
mnt_utils/dns_list.description: A comma separated list of IPV4 addresses of DNS servers
